attributes.action: Stop the introduction of ID cards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Id cards have already suffered scandal at the hands of the public and it is obvious that many fel that they will lead to an invasion of privacy. We should not be subject to ideas that are used in the USA, we are Britsh citizens and do not need foreign ideas being used to govern our lives and country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
